attributes.action: ensure an adequate supply of £5 notes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Banks are not stocking £5 notes in cash machines for their own efficiency reasons.  A BBC poll - web site 21/6 - suggests these to be highly useful to the public.  Current £5 notes are increasingly scruffy as their average life in use has now doubled in the last 10 years due to the shortage of supply. Can pressure be brought to bear upon the British Bankers Association to increase the supply of £5 notes ?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
